name: intl-snippets
description: react-intl snippet and extension for auto complete

commands.title: Find Key for Selected Value in en.json

intlAutoComplete.singleValueReplaceSetti.description: Replace single value automatically or manually
enumDescriptions: Always ask before replace single value

intlAutoComplete.addInEnJsonSetting.description: Add new key in en.json automatically or manually
enumDescriptions: Always add new key in en.json automatically
Always ask before add new key in en.json
Never add new key in en.json

intlAutoComplete.translationFile.description:
Translation file name, for example: en.json, zh-tw.json, etc.
It is for adding new key in translation file or finding key-value in the translation file when not setting directTranslationFilePath.(directTranslationFilePath priority is higher than this setting)

intlAutoComplete.translationFileDirectPa.description:
(Optional)
Specifies the direct path to the translation file (relative to the workspace).
It is used to find a file that is located on a complicated path or not within the workspace.
If set, it will make the searching process faster (though I don't have a strong feeling about it XD).
If left empty, the extension will first look for the translation file at 'src/locales/intl/${translationFile}'.
If not found there, it will then search for the translation file in the same file name.
